§ Is Gemini+Gemtext Close Enough?

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

⸺ published 2023-10-04T20:11:20-07:00

There is a type of person who is attracted to the [[gemini-protocol]] and the [[gemtext-format]] because they wanted a Web that was based on the [[markdown-format]] instead of HTML.

And the **gemini-protocol** + **gemtext** seemed close to that.

❦

Not everyone who is attracted to the gemini-protocol or gemtext-format is this type of person.

But I've talked to enough of these types of people that I know they are definitely out there.
